ygData.subject: RE: Bracer of Erollissi (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I noticed that too!  I was quite surprised and excited.  At the link below, I see the old Stats AC2 STR+5.  Just last Sunday I organized a guild event on
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I noticed that too! I was quite surprised and excited. At the link
below, I see the old Stats AC2 STR+5. Just last Sunday I organized a guild
event on Sisters Island, and later a hand full of us went to get the bracers
from the pirate island, lo and behold AC 5 and STR+5 gotta love it.

http://gameznet.com/eq/equipment/bracererolisi.html

Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
26th Human Bard on Brell

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 4:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Bracer of Erollissi (OT)


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Did the Bracer of Erollissi change in stats? I could have sworn it used to
be AC2 but now its AC5. Anything other items of note change besides
Lionskin gloves getting a ho-hum +2 resistance vs. cold bonus? For the 10pp
plus HQ Lion skin they require these things are a joke.

Kitasi

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
